name: Surge!
description:
Disaster has struck our town - our power plant is breaking down, and producing only half the power we require! You must find a way to reduce power demand, and build alternate power sources!

Game design and development by @Armen138

Additional art and 3D modelling by @iarebatman

Additional GUI coding and design by unbroken-unworn

Some game assets used under cc0 licence by kenney.nl
